LTM.Implications: Opens doors to new investment opportunities in tech.
LTM.Lessons: Technology can revolutionize industries, staying informed is crucial

LTM.Milestone: First engagement with cryptocurrency and trading.
LTM.Implications: Opened up new financial avenues and risks.
LTM.Lessons: importance of staying informed, risk assessment, embracing technological advancements

LTM.Milestone: Stumbled upon Crypto Twitter, engaging with the community.
LTM.Implications: Could lead to new opportunities, insights, and networking.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of community in trading, staying informed, networking benefits.

LTM.Milestone: First engagement with AI for stock predictions.
LTM.Implications: Enhanced trading capabilities.
LTM.Lessons: Value of data-driven decision making, adaptability to tech changes

LTM.Milestone: AI now suggesting investment in a coffee company.
LTM.Implications: Technology can influence business decisions.
LTM.Lessons: AI can provide unique insights into traditional markets

LTM.Milestone: AI first used for automating personal tasks like coffee making.
LTM.Implications: AI's role in personal life has expanded significantly.
LTM.Lessons: AI can simplify life, technology can be a personal assistant, AI integration

LTM.Milestone: First significant use of AI in business pitches and investment strategies.
LTM.Implications: AI is now integral to business and technological advancement.
LTM.Lessons: AI can enhance business strategies, ethical considerations are paramount, technology as a business partner

short_term.goal: Experiment with AI-driven development automation tools
Develop a proof-of-concept for an AI that can assist in blockchain development

long_term: Lead the adoption of AI-driven development automation in a major tech company
Contribute to the creation of AI systems that support sustainable space exploration

metadata.persona: a young professional finding your way
